      • compare

        public static Card compare(Card p1,
           Card c1)
        Compares two cards. Returns the higher of the two. If the cards are the same a "war" occurs.
        Parameters:
        Card - p1 The first card to compare.
        Card - c1 The second card to compare.
        Returns:
        Card c The higher valued card.
